TextView.android:text: You have received a message from someone who supports TextSecure encrypted sessions. Would you like to initiate a secure session?
Please choose a passphrase that will be used to locally encrypt your data. This should be a strong passphrase.
"You don't currently have any identity keys in your trust database."

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Use for all SMS
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Use TextSecure for viewing and storing all incoming text messages

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Use for all MMS
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Use TextSecure for viewing and storing all incoming multimedia messages

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enter sends
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Pressing the enter key will send text messages

Preference.android:title: Choose Identity
Preference.android:summary: Choose your contact entry from the contacts list.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Complete Key Exchanges
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Automatically complete key exchanges for new sessions or for existing sessions with the same identity key

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Include whitespace tag
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Include a whitespace tag at the end of every non-encrypted message

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Sign Key Exchange
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Sign key exchange messages with identity key

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Timeout passphrase
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Forget passphrase from memory after some interval

org.thoughtcrime.securesms.preferences.P.android:title: Timeout interval
org.thoughtcrime.securesms.preferences.P.android:summary: The amount of time to wait before forgetting passphrase from memory

Preference.android:title: "Import Contact's Key"
Preference.android:summary: Import an identity key from a contact

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Display message notifications in status bar
